boat.construction_details: Carvel pitch pine on American rock elm w/ Teak superstructure

for_sales.summary: sold in August 2025. final price not known

boat.full_description: Windflower was designed by Alfred Westmacott and built by Woodnutt and Co.  in Bembridge, IOW in 1932 under the name Wee Mac. she has been sailed successfully in local club regattas with several class wins in the annual Yarmouth Taittinger Regatta including winning the regatta overall in 2013. Windflower has also won Yogaf on two occasions and won a number of races at the RLYC including the coveted Potters Ship Trophy. After being sold in 2025, she moved to her new home of Bucklers Hard and is currently undergoing a full refit ready for the 2026 season
boat.name: Windflower
boat.short_description: Hull is a larger version of that of the XOD but with Gaff rig, large bowsprit and small cabin
